snippet: The Weinstein Company, no stranger to promotion, opted to open “The Players” and “On the Other Side of the Tracks” this weekend with no advance word.
abstract: Weinstein Company quietly releases French-language films The Players (Les Infideles) and On the Other Side of the Tracks (De L'Autre Cote du Periph) to limited New York theaters, with plans to release biopic Yves Saint Laurent in June; company representative says that releases reflect Harvey Weinstein's personal love of French films and growing American interest in foreign pictures.
lead_paragraph: The Weinstein Company, no stranger to promotion, opted to open “The Players” and “On the Other Side of the Tracks” this weekend with no advance word.

headline.main: Weinstein Releases 2 French Films Without Fanfare
headline.print_headline: Weinstein Releases 2 French Films Without Fanfare
